Flashing your keyboardÂ¶

The final step in completing your keyboard is to flash the software onto the keyboard. This step is different for every operating system.

  • MacOS
    • Downloading QMK firmware
      • Installing homebrew
      • Installing your dependencies
      • Installing QMK
    • Flashing your keyboard
  • Windows
    • Downloading QMK firmware
      • Installing homebrew
      • Installing your dependencies
      • Installing QMK
    • Flashing your keyboard
  • Linux (Arch)
    • Downloading QMK firmware
      • Installing homebrew
      • Installing your dependencies
      • Installing QMK
    • Flashing your keyboard
